title: My Little Happiness
overview: ‎The plot tells the story of love between a lawyer trainee and a surgeon, which reunites in a few years. They become colleagues and part-time neighbors. ‎‎Tsun's mother, Jun, arranged for her to leave the country to study economics in the hope that she would be able to settle abroad. However, Tsun Jun, who wants to become a lawyer, secretly returns to the country to be interviewed and start working as an intern in a law firm. To her surprise, her first and biggest obstacle is none other than her childhood friend Wen Shaoqin. To complete the internship smoothly, Tsun Rung enters the battle of minds with Wen Shaoqing.
